title: Smart Ping Radial Dial Bugged
body: Whenever I use smart ping it goes off in a random direction and the cursor basically gets whipped to the edge of the screen and then somehow gets locked to the border. I can take a video if needed. Any help would be appreciated, makes it very difficult to ping mia.

replies.body:
Sometimes that ping radial can go pretty wonky like that when your config settings go a little screwy. Give those a good reset using these steps and try it in a custom game really quick.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

This has happened for years on record. For me it started doing it randomly in the past 6 months. I try to ping in the middle of doing a teamfight etc and it goes into a random ping and flings the cursor. So far have not found a legit fix.

EDIT: Then again never had someone tell me about the config just did uninstalls to try so give that a shot.
